result:
## Summary

Found **2 legitimate bugs** in `fire.formatting` through property-based testing:

1. **WrappedJoin exceeds width limit** (Medium severity) - Produces lines longer than specified width when items exceed the width
2. **Ellipsis truncation functions mishandle small available_space** (Low severity) - Still truncate text after resetting available_space to line_length

Created bug reports:
- `bug_report_fire_formatting_wrappedjoin_2025-08-18_22-30_2erl.md`  
- `bug_report_fire_formatting_ellipsistruncate_2025-08-18_22-30_zbls.md`

Both bugs have been verified with minimal reproducible examples and include suggested fixes. ✅

tool_input.description: Check if fire.formatting is importable in the virtual environment

tool_input.command: cd /root/hypothesis-llm/envs/fire_env && ./bin/python -c "import fire.formatting; print('success - treating as module')"
tool_input.description: Check if fire.formatting is importable using venv python

tool_input.command: source /root/hypothesis-llm/envs/fire_env/bin/activate && python -c "import fire.formatting; print('success - treating as module')"
tool_input.description: Activate venv and check fire.formatting module
Check usage context of EllipsisTruncate in helptext.py
